metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13464 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) 3.0.2. Use of X.Filename instead of X_Filename can bypass some PHP Script Uploads rules, because PHP automatically transforms dots into underscores in certain contexts where dots are invalid. msalvatore> For modsecurity, vulnerability is in the test suite. No security impact. msalvatore> There is securty impact for modsecurity-crs

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13464` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

modsecurity-crs - 3.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: modsecurity: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'vulnerable code is part of the test suite, not production code').
modsecurity-crs package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-1').
